name: Total Calf™ 24% Total Calf-R40
description: Total Calf™ 24% Total Calf-R40 provides a versatile selection of highly digested proteins and carbohydrate sources designed to get calves off to the best possible start depending on individual needs and goals. Formulated to meet the nutritional needs of developing calves when their diets transition from predominantly liquid to entirely dry starter at weaning. Selected yeast fermentation metabolites are included to boost immunological function and calf health. Flaked or rolled corn and clean whole oat choices are available. Individual dairy demands can be accommodated through customization.

Product Families: Formulated Feeds, Whole Foods and Extracts
